subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{cog|yue|搦|tr=nik1}} has a [[wikipedia:Cantonese_nasal-stop_alternation|nasal-stop alternant]] in {{zh-l|拎|ning1}} ({{zh-ref|Kwok et al. (2008)}}).

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=nuò
|c=nik1
|md=niăh
|mn=la̍k/xm,qz:lio̍k/zz:jio̍k
|mn_note=la̍k - "to grasp", "to rub in water"; lio̍k/jio̍k - "to tread on", "to rub and knead"
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=v
}}
